title: American Horror Story: 1984 | Season 9 Ep. 7: Mr. Jingles and Mother Highlight | FX
author: FX Networks
comment: this scene made me hate her.. that’s how good of AN actor she is.
Love her. Recently finished watching the series. 1984 is one of my favorite seasons.  Lily is my favorite actress from the show.
With a mom like that, who'd wanna be born?
I was happy she made an appearance
description:
A mother's love can build or break. Definitely break in this case. #AHS1984

Subscribe now for more American Horror Story clips: http://bit.ly/SubscribeFX 

In the summer of 1984, five friends escape Los Angeles to work as counselors at Camp Redwood. As they adjust to their new jobs, they quickly learn that the only thing scarier than campfire tales is the past coming to haunt you. American Horror Story: 1984 is the ninth installment of the award-winning anthology series created by Ryan Murphy and Brad Falchuk.
